fields.name: Trood Legal account registered RU
fields.subject: Trood-Legal. System registration.
fields.body:
Hi, {{ username }}!

You are now registered in Trood Legal.

Your credentials are as follows

Login: {{ login }}

Password: {{ password }}

System access link: {{ link }}

fields.name: Trood Legal task assigned RU
fields.subject: Trood-Legal. New task assigned.
fields.body:
Hi, {{ username }}!

The new task is asigned: {{ link }}

fields.name: Trood Legal client assigned RU
fields.subject: Trood-Legal. New client assigned.
fields.body:
Hi, {{ username }}!

The new client is assigned: {{ link }}

fields.name: Trood Legal matter assigned RU
fields.subject: Trood-Legal. New matter assigned.
fields.body:
Hi, {{ username }}!

The new matter is assigned: {{ link }}

fields.name: Trood Legal task done RU
fields.subject: Trood-Legal. Task completed.
fields.body:
Hi, {{ username }}!

The task is completed: {{ link }}

fields.name: Trood Legal task deadline RU
fields.subject: Trood-Legal. Task expiration is close.
fields.body:
Hi, {{ username }}!

In {{ deadline_limit }}, the time is expired for the task: {{ link }}

fields.name: Trood Legal meeting is comming RU
fields.subject: Trood-Legal. Meeting reminder.
fields.body:
Hi, {{ username }}!

In {{ deadline_limit }}, the meeting is expected: {{ link }}

fields.name: Trood Legal bill not paid RU
fields.subject: Trood-Legal. Bill reminder.
fields.body:
Hi, {{ username }}!

The bill for {{ client_name }} is not paid for 10 days: {{ link }}

fields.name: Trood Legal bill partly paid RU
fields.subject: Trood-Legal. Bill partial payment.
fields.body:
Hi, {{ username }}!

The bill for {{ client_name }} is partially paid: {{ link }}

fields.name: Trood Legal bill paid RU
fields.subject: Trood-Legal. Bill payment.
fields.body:
Hi, {{ username }}!

The bill for {{ client_name }} is paid in full: {{ link }}

fields.name: Trood Legal matter status changed RU
fields.subject: Trood-Legal. Matter status changed.
fields.body:
Hi, {{ username }}!

The matter {{ matter_name }} has changed status: {{ link }}

fields.name: Trood Legal request vacation assigned
fields.subject: Trood-Legal. Request assigned for approval.
fields.body:
Hi, {{ username }}!

Vacation request assigned for your approval: {{ link }}

fields.name: Trood Legal request vacation approved
fields.subject: Trood-Legal. Vacation request approved.
fields.body:
Hi, {{ username }}!

Your vacation request has been approved: {{ link }}

fields.name: Trood Legal request vacation rejected
fields.subject: Trood-Legal. Vacation request rejected.
fields.body:

fields.name: Trood Legal request vacation canceled
fields.subject: Trood-Legal. Request cancelled.
fields.body:
Hi, {{ username }}!

Vacation request of {{ author }} has been cancelled by requestor: {{ link }}

fields.name: Trood Legal request vacation approved
fields.subject: Trood-Legal. Vacation request approved.
fields.body:
Hi, {{ username }}!

fields.name: Trood Legal request vacation canceled
